  • The Crafts and Software Quality

    20 Jan 2019

        The Software Craftsmanship manifesto links the ideas of craftsmanship and high-quality software.  Building on Agile development methods, this manifesto’s first tenant is: building working and well-crafted software.     I also believe there is a link between craftsmanship and software quality.  Craft guilds have created “systems of quality” that span generations.
